name: Olaplex Shampoo and Conditioner Bundle
description: Your hair's new favourite double act, the OLAPLEX Shampoo and Conditioner Bundle combines two of the brand's best beloved products into one easy to follow routine. As your first step, discover the No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, this silky fluid deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions, so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. Follow this with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner, which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair.
how_to_use: Please see individual product pages for details.

name: Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 45ml
description: The future of hair repair is here in the form of Living Proof's Triple Bond Complex. Think of this as your healthy hair architect that works within your tresses to fortify every strand and help you achieve all your hair care dreams. Used weekly, this intensive reparative treatment is clinically proven to reconstruct damaged hair, while protecting it against future damage to keep your mane in optimal condition. Chemical treatments, bleach and heat-induced damage all take their toll, but thankfully, the Triple Bond Complex is on hand to deliver immediate repair and lasting protection so your hair is restored to a healthy state. Harnessing the powers of a breakthrough, patent-pending technology, this hair saviour repairs and replenishes ionic, hydrogen and covalent bonds. After just one use you'll see immediate results (the impatient amongst us can rejoice), as it will look and feel healthier, with significant improvements being made inside your strands too. Not forgetting about the element of protection, encapsulated cellular oil can be found within this little bottle of gold dust to protect your hair from thermal and UV damage. All of this in a once a week treatment? Our hair care routine is getting upgraded asap!
how_to_use: Shampoo and Condition hair as usual. Then apply 2 pumps to clean, damp hair. Add more as needed, based on hair length, texture, and level of damage. Comb through. Do not rinse out. For best results, wait 10 minutes before applying other treatments or stylers and blow dry. Product does not require heat, but you will see best results with heat activation. Use weekly.
ingredient: Water/Eau/Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Isodecyl Oleate, Isopentyldiol, Dioctyldodecyl Dodecanedioate, Sodium Phytate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Jojoba Esters, Linoleamidopropyl Dimethylamine Dimer Dilinoleate, C10-18 Triglycerides, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Ricinoleate, Cyclodextrin, Propanediol, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Ceteth-20, Steareth-20, PEG-75 Stearate, Polyglycerin-3, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Xanthan Gum, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Fragrance/Parfum, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Gluconic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Citral, Limonene. name: Color Wow Dream Coat Supernatural Spray 200ml
description: An innovative must-have for protecting porous, colour-treated hair, Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray seals each strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak - perfect for fighting frizz. If you colour your hair, your strands are probably more porous and vulnerable to humidity - which means more risk of frizz! Introducing Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray, which 'shrinkwraps' every strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak to prevent frizz and flyaways. Heat-activated, the effects of this spray last through three to four washes and work to compress, tighten and seal hair strands for a supernaturally sleek, smooth and ultra-silky finish. Unlike typical 'humidity-guard' serums, Dream Coat will not build up, weigh hair down or make it greasy - and it comes in a handbag-compatible size so you never fall foul of the weather.
how_to_use: Shampoo, condition, towel dry hair, divide in sections. Spray liberally and evenly on DAMP (not wet) hair. Do not apply other styling products to damp hair. Blow dry each section using a brush to hold hair taut. Requires blow-drying to activate. For best results, use every 3-4 shampoos.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Dipropylene Glycol, Polysilicone-29, DMDM Hydantoin, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Silicone Quaternium-18, Butylene Glycol, Iodopropynyl butylcarbamate, Trideceth-7, Trideceth-12, Phenoxyethanol, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Potassium Benzoate, Citric Acid

name: Olaplex Hair Repair Treatment Kit (Worth £84.00)
description: Starring everything from the dynamic shampoo-and-conditioner duo that's put OLAPLEX on the map to velvety-smooth formulas designed to restore your hair's natural sheen and silkiness, the Hair Repair Treatment Kit unites all of your sought-after staples into one must-have set. Celebrating strength with a scientifically proven routine known to reverse the effects of hair damage, this at-home salon-like experience delivers a surge of hair-renewing hydration that bids dryness a-dew once and for all. Working its magic on all hair types and textures, this efficacious four-piece kit features bond-building miracles that may just have you cancelling that salon appointment after all...
how_to_use: STEP 1 - TREAT: No.0 Intensive Bond Building Treatment + No.3 Hair Perfector™ 1. Before you wash your hair, apply No.0 slowly to dry hair, distributing evenly from root to tip and working into small sections by squeezing the liquid into the hair to be fully absorbed as you go. Hair should be damp, not drenched. Let process for 10 minutes. DO NOT RINSE. 2. Follow directly with No.3. Apply generously to damp hair from scalp to ends until hair is thoroughly saturated. Leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes (or longer if desired). Then, rinse well. STEP 2 - CLEANSE: No.4 Bond Maintenance® Shampoo: 1. Lather and massage into wet hair concentrating on the roots. 2. Rinse well and follow with Olaplex N°5 Bond Maintenance® Conditioner. STEP: 3 - HYDRATE: No.5 Bond Maintenance® Conditioner: 1. After cleansing with OLAPLEX N°4 Bond Maintenance® Shampoo, apply a generous amount from root to tip. 2. Leave on for three minutes, then rinse.

name: Olaplex No.7 Bonding Oil 30ml
description: Ultra-nourishing yet completely weightless, the innovative No. 7 Bonding Oil restores and renews your hair without coating it in a greasy film. Quite the contrary, expect silky smooth lengths that shine brighter than the oil itself. Formulated to rebuild the damaged disulphide bonds in your hair, the star ingredient is bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate – sounds science-y but it works to strengthen and repair damage post-colouring, bleaching or heat styling (and it even works wonders on 'virgin' hair!) Perfect as a conditioning treatment or a styling step (it protects against heat up to 450°!), this oh-so dreamy oil sinks into stressed-out tresses to make them instantly more manageable – smoothing frizz and taming flyaways in its wake.
how_to_use: Turn the bottle upside down and gently tap the index finger on the bottom of the bottle to dispense a metered drop. Apply a small amount to damp or dry hair, style as desired.

name: Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 250ml
description: Discover this deeply cleansing shampoo that works to slough away daily build up as it cleans your locks, revealing a rebalanced and refreshed scalp and radiant lengths. For a gentle exfoliation (that won’t irritate already sensitive or inflamed skin!), this detoxing formula uses sea salt crystals (which won’t clog up your plug or cause damage to the environment like other exfoliants!). There’s a ‘Natural Carbohydrate Complex’ which helps to rebalance your scalp's natural defences by reducing the moisture barrier-compromising effects of dehydration. And you’ll also find bisabolol, extracted from the Brazilian candeia tree, which helps to calm your scalp as it cleanses away dirt, pollution and excess oil.
how_to_use: Once a week, or immediately after rinsing a chemical colourant, apply a tablespoon of product onto wet hair. Gently massage into the scalp, including the nape of the neck, and emulsify. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Grow Gorgeous Repair Daily Rehab Cream 150ml
description: Smoothing, soothing and adding some serious shine to your strands, Grow Gorgeous’ repair cream delivers instant moisture leaving your hair feeling instantly stronger. Powered by Bonding Plex technology, the treatment improves the feel and appearance of weaken locks while creating a protective barrier to help control any unwanted frizz. But that’ not all, blended with wheat extract, avocado and cherry oil, the formula targets damage hair to enhance stronger and supplier tresses while conditioning your locks to ensure a nourished and glossy finish. Now, that’s what we call a good hair day!
how_to_use: Apply daily, work through mid-lengths and ends of freshy washed hair or in-between washes. Style as usual. If contact with eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly. Stop use if redness or itching occurs.

name: Briogeo Destined for Density MegaStrength+ Caffeine and Biotin Peptide Density Serum 45ml
description: If your tresses are looking limp and lacklustre, then you can look no further than Briogeo’s density-boosting serum to boost circulation and leave your hair fuller, healthier and more lustrous than ever before. Healthy, bouncy hair is on all of our beauty wishlists. No amount of root-lifting spray or backcombing can make up for a lack of prep, so make sure you give your hair exactly what it needs with the Destined For Density MegaStrength+ Caffeine + Biotin Peptide Density Serum. Briogeo’s latest lightweight strand-loving formulation works to leave your hair healthy and fine tresses volumised. A unique energy complex — made up of caffeine, CoQ10 and Green Coffee Oil — stimulates the scalp to boost microcirculation while delivering a much-needed dose of antioxidant protection (hello healthy locks). The hair hero, Biotin, nourishes and strengthens each and every strand and follicle to support elasticity, while an infusion of copper peptides ensures a healthy hair life cycle. A fuller, more voluminous head of hair is coming your way (and quickly).
how_to_use: Section hair and apply 1-2 drops on the scalp, focusing on areas of concern (such as temples, crown, and hairline). Massage into the scalp. For best results, use daily on wet or dry hair.

name: Drunk Elephant T.L.C. Happi Scalp Scrub
description: Want to know the secret to a healthy and happy scalp? Let us introduce you to Drunk Elephant's T.L.C. Happi Scalp Scrub, a supercharged AHA and BHA acid blend scrub designed to break down and dissolve dead skin cells as well as styling product build up. Introducing Drunk Elephant's all-new and utterly must-have hair and body range, created by the brand's CEO, Tiffany because "Skin is skin - and whether we call it the scalp or the eye area or the legs, it can only function at its healthiest when it’s treated with smart, nourishing, skin-compatible ingredients. All skin deserves to be respected with ingredients it can get along with." Created in collaboration with professional hair stylist - and creator of 'The Rachel' haircut - Chris McMillan, together they created a line of hair care that focuses on the scalp - products that dissolve years of buildup while nourishing hair with biocompatible proteins and oils. The rest just grew from there. An intelligent AHA/BHA scalp scrub, this has been specifically designed to work its magic within a short period of time (5 - 10 minutes to be exact). After 10 minutes, simply massage the cellulose beads through and rinse. Blended with glycolic, tartaric, lactic and citric acids to dissolve dead cells and buildup as well as marula, mongongo, baobab seed and passionfruit oils to moisturise, nourish, rejuvenate and soothe, this multi-tasking marvel will revive scalp health for a happier head of hair.
how_to_use: Before showering, when hair is dry, apply directly to a dry scalp and massage. Allow to sit for 10 minutes. Rinse thoroughly and follow with Cocomino Shampoo and Conditioner. Use 1 - 2 times per week. Tip: May also be used on body.

name: The Nue Co. Growth Phase Hair Supplements (90 Capsules)
description: Ever felt like your hair just... stopped... growing? Enter: The Nue Co.'s Growth Phase! Introducing this full-spectrum supplement for stagnant strands that is designed to support nutrition deficiencies, hormonal fluctuations and stress. Think of this as the drug-free 'oil' that'll help keep the cogs turning and hair flowing. Taking a 360 holistic approach to better hair care, Growth Phase works from the inside out! Promoting longer, fuller hair with growth stimulating ingredients like proteins and peptides, you can add some much need pep to your hair care routine. It gets better(!)... rest assured that your tresses are being pumped with a whole bunch of essential minerals, micronutrients and vitamins. Boasting noticeable results within just 12 weeks, you'll definitely be the mane attraction in every room.
how_to_use: Take three capsules in the morning with food.

name: OUAI Anti-Dandruff Shampoo 300ml
description: If you're looking for a flake-free remedy that'll not only boost your confidence in your hair but will leave it feeling clean, soft and silky, then the Anti Dandruff Shampoo has your name on it. Oozing with refreshing notes of spearmint, ginger and green fig, this salicylic acid-infused shampoo gently tingles and provides relief from symptoms of dandruff build up, seborrheic dermatitis and psoriasis. Powerful and potent, this rejuvenating formula hits the restart button on sensitive scalps with propanediol caprylate working to improve scalp comfort along with gentle surfactants and conditioning agents that keep hair feeling smooth and clean. Gone are the days of dandruff-coated tops, weighty locks and never-ending itchiness. Yes, ouai...
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair and massage into scalp. Leave on for 5 minutes and rinse thoroughly. For best results use at least twice a week or as directed by a doctor.

name: OUAI Leave In Conditioner 140ml
description: An essential addition to your on-the-go hair care routine, OUAI Haircare’s travel-size Leave-In Conditioner ticks all the boxes – hydrating, conditioning, detangling and protecting from heat in just a few spritzes. Enriched with nutrient-rich amino acids, protective vitamin E and strengthening hydrolysed proteins, it nourishes as it perfects, making hair better in the long-run as well as immediately. Perfect as a pre-style prep spray, it gives stressed-out strands a much-needed moisture boost and improves elasticity and bounce to help you get the best look possible, whatever your style.

description: Just landed and ready to restore damaged hair bonds to a silky-soft, healthy state is the Silkamino collection from Drunk Elephant. The entire range focuses on silk amino acids and silk proteins to target over-processed tresses and leave your hair healthier, shinier and softer than ever before. Healthy, bouncy hair starts right at the wash. No amount of root-lifting spray or backcombing can make up for a lack of prep, so make sure you give your hair exactly what it needs with the Destined for Density Caffeine + Biotin Peptide Density Conditioner. Briogeo’s latest strand-loving formulation works to leave your hair healthy and fine tresses volumised. A unique energy complex — made up of caffeine, CoQ10 and Green Coffee Oil — stimulates the scalp to boost microcirculation while delivering a much-needed dose of antioxidant protection (hello healthy locks). The hair hero, Biotin, nourishes and strengthens each and every strand and follicle to support elasticity, while an infusion of copper peptides ensures a healthy hair life cycle. A fuller, more voluminous head of hair is coming your way (and quickly).

name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Dry Shampoo 92ml
description: Powered by Living Proof's Triple-Action Cleaning Technology to address how hair looks, feels and smells, the brand's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Dry Shampoo boasts a fast-absorbing powder that soaks up oil and sweat while the patented 'Healthy Hair Molecule' (OFPMA) also helps you remove the powders easily from hair, resulting in truly clean hair. You won't regret investing in this miracle worker that also feature odour neutralisers ad time-released fragrance that keeps hair smelling clean throughout the day - no-one need know how long ago you last washed your tresses.
how_to_use: SHAKE CAN EXTREMELY WELL FOR MAXIMUM CLEANING RESULTS. Hold canister about 6-10" away from dry hair. Section thoroughly and apply product in a sweeping motion to dirty/oily areas. Wait 30 seconds for the powders to activate and cleanse. Then remove by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more if needed, make sure to shake again. Style as desired. Tip: See a little white residue? No worries, that's the cleaning in action as the oil and sweat are absorbed by the dry shampoo. Just wait 30 seconds and brush gently to remove. Although most people don't need to, you can use a hair dryer to remove extra powder from your hair.

Style and substance together (at last!) this uniquely formulated styling aid thickens and preserves the hair you have while giving instant lift right from the root. description: An innovative must-have for protecting porous, colour-treated hair, Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray seals each strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak - perfect for fighting frizz. Heat-activated, the effects of this spray last through three to four washes and work to compress, tighten and seal hair strands for a supernaturally sleek, smooth and ultra-silky finish. Unlike typical 'humidity-guard' serums, Dream Coat will not build up, weigh hair down or make it greasy - and it comes in a handbag-compatible size so you never fall foul of the weather.

name: The Ordinary Multi-Peptide Serum for Hair Density 60ml
description: Having already transformed our skin care regimes, we could only dream that The (extraordinary…) Ordinary would branch out into hair care – and, with this Multi-Peptide Serum for Hair Density, they have! According to the brand itself, this concentrated formula ‘is designed to support hair health so that it looks thicker, denser, fuller and healthier’ – all words we’d very much like to use to describe our own (occasionally lacklustre) locks. So, how does it reap these miraculous results? A combination of potent natural extracts (Larix Europaea Wood Extract and Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract), peptide complexes and caffeine power this ultra-lightweight formulation, united in an emollient base so that it can effectively penetrate your scalp and work deep within hair follicles. Ideally, use it at bedtime, applying it to a clean, dry scalp before massaging in thoroughly and leaving it on (some may prefer to rinse in the morning).

description: Answering the wishes of limp-haired beauties, Color Wow's Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer Travel transforms fine tresses into beautifully thick, full hair for days on end. name: Color Wow Raise the Root Spray 150ml
description: Perfect for those with fine, lifeless or flyaway strands, Color Wow's Raise the Root Spray provides long-lasting lift without stiffness or stickiness. Completely invisible, this innovative mist is formulated with unique, completely clear polymers that won't distort your precious colour, while the flexible formula creates an ingenious 'spring' around strands to boost bounce and build body. Suitable for use on wet or dry hair, this keeps your hair soft and aloft for voluminous, head-turning 'oomph' while ensuring your colour stays true (it won't yellow or darken your roots).

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Milky Leave-In Conditioner 210ml
description: A flexible formula that transforms your mane by fighting frizz, detangling tresses, repairing split ends and protecting against heat damage... only Sol de Janeiro could create a leave-in conditioner that smells this good. Deliciously-scented with the lauded Cheirosa '62 aroma of irresistible pistachio and salted caramel... this mist is here to restore stressed-out strands to a healthy and silky-soft state. The first step in your post hair-wash routine to perfectly prime and prep your hair before heat styling, this lightweight mist locks in moisture and blocks out humidity (you'll frizz no more) with 'Babaçu Oil'. Rich in selenium, 'Brazil Nut Oil' protects your locks against breakage and keeps them strong, while thirst-quenching 'Cupuaçu Butter' nourishes strands that are craving hydration. name: OUAI Detox Shampoo Travel Size 89ml
description: Anyone else in the mood for a spa day but for your hair? We know we always are! Definitely going a-OUAI with us for a relaxing self care weekend is this Detox Shampoo. What better way to hit the ultimate reset button than to start with your hair because sometimes a good and thorough wash day is all you need. A once-a-week option for those who're suffering from dry shampoo-dependency that's crammed with hard-working chelating agents which help to remove the stubborn hard water deposits and impurities that sit in our strands, and the hair-loving apple cider vinegar that's perfect for a deep exfoliation to lift the dandruff, flakes and residue. It gets better - heroing hydrolyzed keratin means your tresses will be left feeling softer, silkier and shinier after every single wash. Don't just take our word for it, add to basket and be blown a-OUAI by the undeniable results...

Part hair using fingers and apply Detox shampoo as close to the scalp as possible. Let it work its magic for one to three minutes before rinsing thoroughly.

name: The INKEY List Salicylic Acid Exfoliating Scalp Treatment 150ml
description: If hairs stubbornly oily then help is at hand: THE INKEY LISTs Salicylic Acid Exfoliating Scalp Treatment swiftly eliminates build-up and lift-inhibiting grime as it gently eradicates flakes to help minimise itching. With 2% salicylic acid to exfoliate and help to purge embedded impurities, alongside 2.5% FluidPure 8G which soothes redness and calms irritation, this balancing formula also stars 1% panthenol to maintain moisture levels for silky smooth lengths. Great for those susceptible to stressed-out scalps or flakes, this normalising pre-wash serum works to swiftly re-establish equilibrium - in clinical trials, 100% of testers felt their hair and scalp was less oily after 28 days of use, while 95% said that their scalp was less itchy.

No really, the shine and softness are unreal... It's made with fast-absorbing powders to soak up oil and sweat, which the brand's advanced powder removal system then easily eliminates for a fresh start. A helping of conditioning agents then adds softness, shine and manageability in between washes, while the refreshing spray neutralises odours and balances the scalp's sebum levels to keep your hair clean for longer. The cherry on top of the length-loving formula? It leaves no visible or textured residue so it won't look like you've dunked flour over your head! Stock up on the full size (198ml) to add to your at-home hair care collection, or throw the travel size (92ml) in your handbag for an on-the-go refresh.
how_to_use: Shake can extremely well for maximum cleaning results. Hold can 6-10” away from dry, dirty hair. Section and apply the product in a sweeping motion. Wait 30 seconds. Remove powder by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more as needed, shake can again. Style as desired. Perfect hair Day™ Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo can be used on most hair types. For thicker, coarser hair, section more thoroughly upon application. For curly hair, remove powders with a blow dryer on low and directed at the roots where the product was applied (vs. fingers or brush, which will deconstruct the curl).

name: Color Wow Dream Filter Treatment 200ml
description: Working overtime to keep your colour fresh and bright, this innovative pre-shampoo treatment helps to lift the dulling particles that compromise your colour to reveal a vibrant finish. The perfect way to mane-tain the integrity of your colour or highlights, it’s made with one-of-a-kind, breakthrough technology (two molecular filters with two polymeric filters) to gently and effectively remove minerals and metals from your hair. Anything from calcium and magnesium to copper, iron and chlorine can be deposited along your lengths - due to everything from the environment to the water you wash your locks with; they accumulate on your hair and can discolour your precious tresses. No more! This non-stripping spray revives vibrancy in no time at all - and comes in a sized-to-try bottle to trigger addiction before you (inevitably) commit.
how_to_use: Apply Dream Filter to dry hair before shampooing. Spray evenly to saturate hair thoroughly. Wait 1-3 minutes, then shampoo. Suggested use is every 3-4 shampoos to keep your colour looking fresh and bright. But, with frequent exposure to well water or chlorine, you can use it more often (even daily) because, unlike chelating products, DREAM FILTER is extremely gentle.

Case in point: this reparative mist is the ultimate protection against heat styling so you can perfect your blowout skills without worrying about damaging effects. What’s more, it helps to speed up your blow dry time, while also boosting volume — so you’re left with luscious, bouncy tresses with zero stickiness and endless shine.

name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo 90ml
description: Designed to rival your go-to rinse-out shampoo, Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo not only keeps hair clean between washes, but it even cares for it too. No really, the shine and softness are unreal... It's made with fast-absorbing powders to soak up oil and sweat, which the brand's advanced powder removal system then easily eliminates for a fresh start. A helping of conditioning agents then adds softness, shine and manageability in between washes, while the refreshing spray neutralises odours and balances the scalp's sebum levels to keep your hair clean for longer. The cherry on top of the length-loving formula? It leaves no visible or textured residue so it won't look like you've dunked flour over your head! Stock up on the full size (198ml) to add to your at-home hair care collection, or throw the travel size (92ml) in your handbag for an on-the-go refresh.
how_to_use: Shake can extremely well for maximum cleaning results. Hold can 6-10” away from dry, dirty hair. Section and apply the product in a sweeping motion. Wait 30 seconds. Perfect hair Day™ Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo can be used on most hair types. For thicker, coarser hair, section more thoroughly upon application. For curly hair, remove powders with a blow dryer on low and directed at the roots where the product was applied (vs. fingers or brush, which will deconstruct the curl).

name: Color Wow Dream Filter 50ml Travel
description: Working overtime to keep your colour fresh and bright, this innovative pre-shampoo treatment helps to lift the dulling particles that compromise your colour to reveal a vibrant finish. The perfect way to mane-tain the integrity of your colour or highlights, it’s made with one-of-a-kind, breakthrough technology (two molecular filters with two polymeric filters) to gently and effectively remove minerals and metals from your hair. Anything from calcium and magnesium to copper, iron and chlorine can be deposited along your lengths - due to everything from the environment to the water you wash your locks with; they accumulate on your hair and can discolour your precious tresses. No more! This non-stripping spray revives vibrancy in no time at all - and comes in a sized-to-try bottle to trigger addiction before you (inevitably) commit.

Oribe's signature bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) defends hair from oxidative stress while also guarding against the deterioration of natural keratin. The strand-shielding cream is powered by a cocktail of strengthening hydrolyzed elastin, moisturising castor oil and fatty acid-rich olive oil to counter breakage and boost shine. Forget post-swim straw-like strands, your hair will be left looking radiant and feeling glossy! As well as shielding your strands from UV rays, chlorine and salt water, it also helps to protect against discolouration which means it’s perfect for blondes — rest assured, the mask will not react to chlorine or turn your hair green!

description: The only cleanser that’s deserving of your beloved fur bébé’s coat, Ouai’s Pet Shampoo is specially formulated for pampered pets – lifting dirt and intensely hydrating from snoot through to tail. Enriched with nourishing ingredients that won’t aggravate itchy or sensitive skin, this formula uses rambutan seed extract, vegetable protein and panthenol to soften fur and deliver a Crufts-worthy shine. Cue: instant waggy tails, satisfied purrs and very, very happy humans, because this shampoo is infused with the brand's delicious (and unbelievably long-lasting) 'Mercer Street' scent too. A far cry from whatever your pet rolled around in the other week, (OI – COME BACK HERE!) this formula is bursting with Italian lemon, iris, white musk, lily, jasmine sambac and Turkish Rose for infinitely sweet snuggles and no wrinkled noses. Formulated without any gluten, parabens, phthalates, SLS or SLES, this cruelty-free shampoo will have your pet begging for bath time (well, we can dream), and you can kiss goodbye to dirty paws on your freshly-mopped floor. You’re welcome.
how_to_use: Brush your fur bébé before shampooing. Wet coat thoroughly. Massage liberally from back of ears to tail. Be careful to avoid eyes. Rinse well and towel dry.

name: The Ordinary Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair 240ml
description: With a 'gentle-is-essential' formula, the Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair is an effective cleanser that rids your hair, skin and scalp of excess sebum, dirt, debris and product residue - without leaving skin feeling stripped, dry or irritated. With a lightly foaming formula, this multipurpose product uses a modified sulphate derivative called SLES-2, at a minimal concentration of just 4%. This modified sulphate is an effective cleansing agent - its a surfactant, which dissolves the barrier between dirt and oil on your skin, scalp and hair, allowing this to be rinsed away easily with water - but doesn't feature the irritating, sensitising or drying attributes we often associate with traditional sulphates. Instead, it helps to maintain the skin barrier - both on your body and your scalp - to keep it hydrated and healthy. In fact, this cleanser can even safely be used to a colour-treated mane without stripping it.
how_to_use: Work the cleanser into wet hair and body. Rinse. If irritation occurs, rinse off, cease use, and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Polysorbate 20, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Phytic Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.

name: BLEACH LONDON White Heat Super Colour Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: BLEACH LONDON Reincarnation Mask 500ml
description: Don’t let colour kill your hair – resurrect strands and remain the best tressed with BLEACH London’s Reincarnation Mask. Magnificently moisturising, this intensive treatment is enriched with sunflower seed extract and micro wheat proteins to hydrate hair and boost elasticity, while also imparting enviable shine, strength and colour vibrancy. For a total treat, enhance the ultra-conditioning effect by wrapping hair in a warm towel and leaving this on for 10-20 minutes. The formula is completely cruelty-free and vegan (like the entire BLEACH line, in fact) so you can comfort scalp, strands and conscience at once. Sublime.
how_to_use: Apply to shampooed hair, comb through and massage in. To enhance the super conditioning effect, wrap your hair in a warm towel. Leave on hair for 10-20 minutes. Rinse well. Use whenever your hair feels parched.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Octyldodecanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Isopropyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Lauryl Pyrrolidone, Trideceth-12, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Polyamide-2, Benzoic Acid, Saccharomyces/Magnesium Ferment, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Saccharomyces/Iron Ferment, Saccharomyces/Zinc Ferment, Saccharomyces/Copper Ferment, Saccharomyces/Silicon Ferment, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Linalool

name: OUAI Scalp Serum 50ml
description: Firmly of the belief that healthy hair starts with the scalp, Ouai has created the hydrating and rebalancing scalp serum to bring us the healthy hair that we have coveted for oh-so long. Supporting the appearance of thicker, healthier and more lustrous hair just got sensorial with this earthy and uplifting treatment. Anything that smells this good has to be Ouai, and a new fresh scent too! Has Christmas come early? Top notes of ginger and spearmint run down through tomato leaves and green fig to settle in base notes of wet grass and ambroxan for a truly indulgent self care moment as you massage this into your scalp. Cultivating the healthiest environment for your hair to flourish in are arctic root, Siberian ginseng and chaga mushroom, adaptogens that promote hydration and a healthy barrier. Have you gone a little OTT on the styling front? Fear not, red clover extract works to reduce scalp discomfort from overstimulation while peptides support the full, thick and healthy hair we have always dreamed of…we’re ready for our close-up now.
how_to_use: Apply daily for best results. This is a leave-in product, do not rinse out. Must be applied directly to the scalp. Can be applied in the am or pm on wet or dry hair. Do not apply to open wounds and/or broken skin on the scalp. Start application in your natural part and along your hairline. Press and release the bulb once to fill the glass pipette. Unscrew the cap. Use short, quick presses to release drops throughout the scalp. Massage in to help distribute and absorb into the scalp. SCALP SERUM is skin care inspired. The key is consistent use to see results and absorption. Face serums typically can take anywhere from a 1 minute to a few minutes to absorb and completely dry. Same goes for SCALP SERUM – wait until the serum has completely dried and absorbed before washing hair. If applying at night you are safe to wash your hair and scalp in the morning. If you apply in the morning you will safe to wash your hair and scalp in the afternoon or evening.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Polysorbate 20, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Polyquaternium-7, Rhodiola Rosea Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Tocopherol, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Dextran, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Acanthopanax Senticosus (Eleuthero) Root Extract, Rhaponticum Carthamoides Root Extract, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium Edta, Sodium Hydroxide, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Eugenol, Limonene, Linalool.

name: Coco & Eve Miracle Hair Elixir
description: From the beachy haired duo that brought us the now iconic Super Nourishing Coconut & Fig Hair Masque, Coco & Eve bring us their all-new Like A Virgin Miracle Hair Elixir. Here to help you get instant shine, silkiness and frizz control, this ultra-hydrating hair serum is a must-try. Get ready to own the hair of your dreams thanks to Coco & Eve's Like A Virgin Miracle Hair Elixir. Brimming with hydrating and smoothing hyaluronic acid as well as prickly pear, mangosteen, papaya and raw, virgin coconut oil, this magical hair elixir imparts covetable gloss and shine while imparting hair with much-needed hydration to help repair and nourish locks in need.
how_to_use: Apply to wet or dry hair. Rub a couple of drops between hands. Apply from mid-lengths to ends of hair. Adjust amount according to length and texture of hair. Blow-dry or leave to air dry.

name: ghd Mini Bodyguard Heat Protect Spray 50ml
description: Always use protection! As much as we love our precious styling tools, there's no denying that the high temperatures can cause damage to our tresses. That's where ghd's Bodyguard - Heat Protect Spray comes in. Now available in the original (120ml) bottle and a sized-to-try (50ml) vial, there's no excuse for going without this tress-protecting hero! Enriched with ghd's 'Heat Protection System', it contains protection polymers that invisibly shield your precious locks from potential heat damage. Lightweight and non-sticky, the formula can be layered with other styling products or used alone prior to heat styling for a salon-worthy finish you'll fall mane over heels for.
how_to_use: Spritz over damp or dry hair from roots to tips - around 6-8 sprays for mid-to-long hair. Comb through the product to ensure it's evenly distributed. Heat style as normal. If you're layering this with other products, apply it first.

name: OUAI Fine Hair Shampoo Refill 946ml
description: Bottling their beloved hair-plumping shampoo in a design more than to fit to grace your bathroom shelfie, look to the Fine Hair Shampoo to bring bounce and brilliant shine into your strands’ future. If your hair feels eternally flat and seems impervious to movement, it can be a nightmare to style. That’s where this volumising shampoo steps in. The silky formula is infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin plus biotin to promote thick, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of hemp seed extract and chia seed oil grants lasting, weightless(!) hydration to your fine hair. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is the perfect finishing touch; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a delicate scent even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair - pause to admire the luscious scent - then rinse for enviable movement.

This velveteen conditioner boosts the body of your hair as it softens and smooths each strand, so you can spend less time scrunching or teasing and more time chilling. It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin and biotin to promote thick, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of hemp seed extract and chia seed oil grants lasting, weightless(!) hydration to your fine hair. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is the perfect finishing touch; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a beautiful scent even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml
description: An iconic hair hero given an irresistibly tropical twist, Philip Kingsley’s Coconut Breeze Elasticizer will transform your hair care ritual. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture in the cuticle without weighing strands down. Infused with exotic scent, this Coconut Breeze incarnation captures the scent of sunshine and pure white sands, taking your head on a holiday with warm notes of coconut, jasmine, almond and vanilla. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A treat for the senses as well as tresses, this will leave your locks smelling divine, as well as looking and feeling intensely nourished, healthy and shiny – and all before you’ve used shampoo. Impressive!
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only

name: Philip Kingsley Body Building Shampoo (250ml)
description: To give your hair maximum volume while gently cleansing, Philip Kingsleys Body Building Shampoo boosts fine, limp hair with weightless body and bounce. Ideal for flat hair thats prone to getting oily quickly, the formula plumps each and every strand for thicker, fuller looking hair. Its enriched with natural cellulose to achieve this plumping, as well as keratin proteins to help strengthen hair and improve its overall volume. Meanwhile, copolymers control flyaway and static and the gentle cleansing action removes excess build-up and product residue. Suitable for daily use and safe for colour-treated hair, the Body Building Shampoo makes fine hair healthier and more manageable.And now this 'oomph'-boosting formula comes in a handy travel size (75ml) too because nobody fancies flat hair on their holidays.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair Lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp Rinse and repeat if necessary Follow with the appropriate Philip Kingsley conditioner and scalp toner

name: Gisou Honey Infused Hair Wash 330ml
description: A mane cleanser for people that hate that dry, brittle feeling so many shampoos can leave on your hair, the Honey Infused Hair Wash is gentle, effective, impressively hydrating andbetterthan ever with an all-new formula! Relieving your hair of sebum build up, pollution and dirt, this floral-scented formula creates a rich lather, with honey as the star of the show. A natural humectant (meaning it slurps up and holds hydration within the hair shaft), this star ingredient is packed with vitamins, amino acids and antioxidants to impart strength, help repair damage and add enviable shine. Cue: advert-worthy tresses in 3, 2, 1...
how_to_use: Apply 2-3 pumps of hair wash to the hair and scalp, use more for long or thick hair. Massage evenly into a lather, then rinse thoroughly.

name: OUAI Scalp & Body Scrub
description: The perfect reset for scalp and skin alike, OUAI Haircare’s Scalp & Body Scrub is the ultimate weekly detox (did someone say self-care Sunday..?) Deep cleansing and gently foaming, the scrub is powered by gently exfoliating sugar crystals which cleanse and soften skin, and conditioning coconut oil to replenish moisture. For even deeper scalp cleansing, Jen Atkin’s top tip is to add a small amount of your favourite OUAI shampoo to this superb scrub.
how_to_use: Scalp: Section wet hair to reveal scalp and massage in circular motions to gently exfoliate. Rinse. Body: Apply to damp skin and massage in circular motions to gently exfoliate. Rinse. Need even deeper cleansing? Add a small amount of your favourite OUAI shampoo to the Scalp & Body Scrub for squeaky clean hair.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Anti-Frizz Hair Oil 58ml
description: Ultra-hydrating and divinely scented, Sol de Janeiro’s Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Hair Oil promotes mirror-like shine and impressively sleek strands. It’s infused with a nourishing cocktail of Brazilian oils (read: patauá, buriti and pequi) which are brimming with antioxidants, fatty acids and essential vitamins that deeply moisturise, smooth and enhance the lustre of your lengths. This luscious oil is also laced with the brand’s iconic Cheirosa ’62 scent that’s sure to transport you to the sun-soaked beaches of Rio as work it into your strands. It’s credentials are pretty stellar too; in a clinical study conducted by an independent third party lab, the oil (when used as directed) was clinically proven to repair split ends and provide 72-hour frizz control and up to 450° heat protection.
how_to_use: For Wet/Damp Hair: Use this oil treatment as a before air drying or heat styling to tame frizz — or as a heat protectant for up to 450 degrees. Ideal for dry, damaged hair. For Dry Hair: Rub a small amount of oil in between your palms, and start with your ends, working your way up to mid-shaft. Benefits of application on dry hair include taming flyways, managing frizz, enhancing shine, or adding hydration in between washes.
ingredient: Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Coco-Caprylate, Parfum (Fragrance), Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuaçu) Seed Butter, Caryocar Brasiliense (Pequi) Fruit Oil, Oenocarpus Bataua (Patauá) Fruit Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethiconol, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin, Limonene, Cl 40800 (Beta-Carotene).

name: The INKEY List Caffeine Stimulating Scalp Treatment 150ml
description: If you find that you’re moulting more than usual, or feel like your hair is increasingly thin, THE INKEY LIST’s Caffeine Stimulating Scalp Treatment was made with you in mind. Clinically proven to reduce and prevent hair loss (after three months of testing, 85% of testers showed significant improvement), this overnight treatment invigorates stem cells to optimise growth and increase your hair’s thickness. With 1% caffeine powder – a stimulant that kick-starts sluggish follicles – alongside 1% Redensyl (which both supplements growth and helps counteract fallout) and 1% Betaine to soften and nourish each strand, this helps to build body for lustrous locks.
how_to_use: We recommend shaking the bottle before use. Use as an overnight treatment. Shake into the palm of your hand, massage hands together, use your fingertips to rub into scalp and leave on overnight. Apply enough to cover entire scalp. Wash hair as normal in the morning, if desired. Use every night for best results over a 3 month period.
ingredient: 1% Caffeine Powder – helps to stimulate scalp and hair follicles 1% Redensyl™ – helps to improve hair growth while reducing hair loss 1% Betaine – helps to condition hair, leaving it soft and silky Water (Aqua\Eau), Betaine, Caffeine, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Metabisulfite, Glycine, Larix Europaea Wood Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Tea) Extract, Zinc Chloride. *Packaging may vary.

name: OUAI Curl Crème 236ml
description: To craft their Curl Crème - Fragranced, the minds behind OUAI Haircare turned to the most knowledgable, discerning people they know: their very own curly-haired community. That's right, this luscious blend was co-created with 150 members of their community and faced over a year of testing before they were sure it was worthy of touching your curls... This does-it-all styling cream is brimming with conditioning plant oils that add definition, shine and impressive hydration to parched coils, curls and ringlets. It's unique consistency first goes on like a cream before melting into your hair with the swiftness of an oil; speaking of which, at the heart of the formula is a frizz-smoothing duo of chia and linseed oils that emphasise the shape of your curls as well as protecting them against humidity. Coconut oil then floods your hair with hydration and helps to seal damaged cuticles, while babassu oil softens and enhances shine. The finishing touch is an infusion of the brand's fan-favourite North Bondi scent: a bergamot and lemon blend that's simply bewitching. As for what's not included, this vegan cream is free from silicones, SLS, parabens, phthalates and gluten. Psst, the tube is also made out of sugarcane plastic, making it 100% recyclable!
how_to_use: On wet hair: To prevent breakage, section and detangle your hair using a wide-tooth comb (stay away from bristle brushes because they can disrupt your curl pattern) Start with a dime-size amount of Curl Crème and evenly distribute it with your fingers (it’s super creamy and melts into your curls like an oil) Comb through each section using your fingers to ensure Curl Crème blesses each and every curve Let your hair dry, then say hello to your softest curls ever If you plan on heat styling later and want heat protection, pair Curl Crème with OUAI Leave In Conditioner, our multitasking detangler and leave-in that provides thermal heat protection and weightless hydration On dry hair: A little bit of Curl Crème goes a long OUAI in refreshing day-two or day-three curls. On dry hair, apply Curl Crème sparingly and directly to your curls to help define and smooth frizz and flyaways.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Orbignya Speciosa Kernel Oil, Behentrimonium Chloride (Anti-Static Agent / Agent Antistatique), Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Cetrimonium Chloride (Anti-Static Agent / Agent Antistatique), Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Lauryl Glucoside, Polyquaternium-37, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol,Isopropyl Alcohol, Xylitol,Caprylic Acid, Sorbitan Oleate, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Fragrance / Parfum, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Citronellol.

name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo Jumbo 355ml
description: Powered by Living Proof's Triple-Action Cleaning Technology to address how hair looks, feels and smells, the brand's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Dry Shampoo boasts a fast-absorbing powder that soaks up oil and sweat while the patented 'Healthy Hair Molecule' (OFPMA) also helps you remove the powders easily from hair, resulting in truly clean hair. You won't regret investing in this miracle worker that also feature odour neutralisers ad time-released fragrance that keeps hair smelling clean throughout the day - no-one need know how long ago you last washed your tresses.
how_to_use: SHAKE CAN EXTREMELY WELL FOR MAXIMUM CLEANING RESULTS. Hold canister about 6-10" away from dry hair. Section thoroughly and apply product in a sweeping motion to dirty/oily areas. Wait 30 seconds for the powders to activate and cleanse. Then remove by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more if needed, make sure to shake again. Style as desired. Tip: See a little white residue? No worries, that's the cleaning in action as the oil and sweat are absorbed by the dry shampoo. Just wait 30 seconds and brush gently to remove. Although most people don't need to, you can use a hair dryer to remove extra powder from your hair.
ingredient: Isobutane, Propane, Alcohol Denat, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Cellulose, Octafluoropentyl Methacrylate (OFPMA), Caprylyl Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Citronellyl Methylcrotonate, Hydroxypropylcellulose, Hydrated Silica, Cetrimonium Chloride, Zeolite, Ethylcellulose, Octoxynol-10, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Water/Eau/Aqua, Fragrance/Parfum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenethyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Coumarin

name: Aveda Rosemary Mint Purifying Shampoo 250ml
description: If your hair seems to never quite feel as fresh as you'd like then it's high time you introduced Aveda's Rosemary Mint Purifying Shampoo into your tress-care sessions... This effective cleansing formula is powered by a medley of deeply clarifying ingredients that help to leave your hair feeling squeaky clean, revitalised and ever-so shiny. It's made 97% naturally derived ingredients and features micelles to gently lift product build-up and impurities without disrupting the balance of your scalp and strands, as well as white vinegar to purify your hair without stripping it! The finishing touch is an invigorating aroma of certified organic rosemary, peppermint and spearmint that promises to stimulate your senses as you shower.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair. Rinse. Follow with rosemary mint weightless conditioner.

name: Gisou Honey Infused Conditioner 240ml
description: Weightless yet incredibly nourishing, the Honey Infused Hair Conditioner is formulated to hydrate, repair and detangle strands, all while infusing them with a gently floral fragrance. So what makes this conditioner so special? Well, the lightweight formula leaves hair soft and manageable rather than straggly or greasy, and it puts the star ingredient, honey, front and centre. A natural humectant (meaning it slurps up and holds hydration within the hair shaft), honey is packed with vitamins, amino acids and antioxidants to impart strength, help repair damage and add all of the shine.
how_to_use: After shampooing, squeeze out excess water and apply conditioner from the mid-lengths to ends. Distribute evenly throughout the hair and leave on for 1-2 minutes before rinsing.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Intensive Treatment 150ml
description: An iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsleys Elasticizer will transform your hair care ritual. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture to the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny and all before youve used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage youll never want to wash your hair without it.
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Dimethyl PABA, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Trideceth-12, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid

name: Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 75ml
description: Discover this deeply cleansing shampoo that works to slough away daily build up as it cleans your locks, revealing a rebalanced and refreshed scalp and radiant lengths. For a gentle exfoliation (that won’t irritate already sensitive or inflamed skin!), this detoxing formula uses sea salt crystals (which won’t clog up your plug or cause damage to the environment like other exfoliants!). There’s a ‘Natural Carbohydrate Complex’ which helps to rebalance your scalp's natural defences by reducing the moisture barrier-compromising effects of dehydration. And you’ll also find bisabolol, extracted from the Brazilian candeia tree, which helps to calm your scalp as it cleanses away dirt, pollution and excess oil.
how_to_use: Once a week, or immediately after rinsing a chemical colourant, apply a tablespoon of product onto wet hair. Gently massage into the scalp, including the nape of the neck, and emulsify. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Olaplex Hero Bundle
description: Over done it with the dye or scorched your strands with your straighteners? Allow us to introduce you to OLAPLEX's Hero Bundle: a three-piece routine of their hair repair heroes. Earning upwards of 500 reviews, the No 3 Hair Perfector (100ml) is a pre-shampoo that's powered by star ingredient bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate (sounds science-y, we know) to strengthen and repair damage post-colouring, bleaching or heat styling. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, the No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo (250ml) deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions, so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. Follow this with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner (250ml), which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair.
how_to_use: Please see individual product pages for details.

name: Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Hair Butter 250ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by hosts of discerning celebrities and beauty buffs around the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.
how_to_use: Warm product onto the palm of your hand before applying. For medium to thick hair: apply product on towel-dried hair and leave in for 5-10 minutes. Proceed to rinse well. For medium to fine hair: apply on dry hair and leave in for 10 minutes. Proceed to rinse well and shampoo as usual. For an extra nourishing boost: apply both before and after shampooing as noted above.

name: Gisou Propolis Infused Heat Protecting Spray 200ml
description: So much more than just a heat protectant, the Propolis Infused Heat Protecting Spray enhances your hair’s natural volume, protects hair from heat up to 230ᵒC/446ᵒF and contains a UV-filter to prevent sun damage. Phew… The key here really is propolis, a deeply fortifying ingredient that fuels all of Gisou’s superstar styling range. Produced and used by bees to build strong beehives, propolis contains plenty of oils, vitamins, minerals and flavonoids to protect your hair and keep it at its most healthy — all while create a shield against the drying, breakage-causing effects of heat styling.
how_to_use: Mist evenly from an arm’s length onto towel-dried hair before blow-drying. On dry hair, spray lightly onto divided sections of the hair. Allow to dry before using heated styling tools. Mist evenly from an arm's length before sun exposure.

name: OUAI Texturizing Hair Spray 40g
description: The perfect way to add some ‘grit’ to slippery hair types, OUAI’s Texturizing Hair Spray is ideal for recreating that enviable ‘French girl’ look – a tousled sexiness that exudes Parisian nonchalance. Invert your head and spray the roots to create ‘oomph’ (and absorb oil), then spray the lengths and ‘tszuj’ with fingers to achieve a separated, choppy finish. Enriched with OUAI’s ‘Smart Technology’ – a cocktail of nourishing ingredients including amino acids, tamarind seed, keratin, ama oil, hibiscus and jasmine to strengthen, enhance moisture levels, repair and protect from humidity – this refreshes, volumises and perfumes your strands with the delicate scents of Italian bergamot, rose, lily of the valley, waterlily, iris and white musk (ideal to disguise a stale, night-on-the-town odour).
how_to_use: Shake it up. Holding the bottle 6" from your head, mist dry hair from roots to ends. For ultimate volume, flip hair upside down and spray. Jen's Tip: Mist it on dry hair and scrunch strands out with your fingers for a loose, lived-in look. Flip hair upside down and spray for instantly fresh-looking hair.

name: Coco & Eve Super Hydration Kit (£45.80)
description: Cleanse, condition and treat your mane with the Super Hydration Kit, an irresistibly scented set (get ready to fall in love with Coco & Eve's signature 'Coconut & Fig' fragrance) that promises smooth, shiny and healthy hair. Inside this crowd pleasing duoyou'll find: the Super Hydrating Shampoo, which uses hyaluronic acid to intensely hydrate for a smooth and soft finish, while pineapple fruit enzymes slough away the dirt, dry skin and excess product build-up atop your scalp; the Super Hydrating Conditioner, which uses nourishing avocado to pump strands with proteins and vitamins and coconut to feed lengths with fatty acids that seal split ends.
how_to_use: Shampoo: Apply a small amount to damp hair & scalp. Use a shampoo brush for a relaxing scalp massage and to release the lather. Rinse thoroughly then follow with Conditioner. Conditioner: On clean, damp hair work a small amount on the lengths & ends. Leave for up to 3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

name: Augustinus Bader The Conditioner 150ml
description: On the hunt for a conditioner that hydrates hair without leaving it lank or weighed down? Look no further than Augustinus Bader’s The Conditioner with TCF8. Exceptionally hardworking, this hydrator does more than just add moisture; the amnio-acid rich ‘TFC8 Complex’ also helps to repair heat and colour damage, tame frizz, detangle knots and build body for a truly luxurious mane. Alongside this, oat kernel oil supports the elasticity of the hair cuticle (easing breakage that can typically come from putting your hair up or your hair rubbing against your clothes) while keeping strands plump and hydrated. To boost volume even further, there’s maca root extract, which stimulates hair growth right from the follicle, while also protecting and strengthening strands from root to tip.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp hair after using The Shampoo from Augustinus Bader and work through the length of hair starting from the scalp. Rinse thoroughly after 1-2 minutes for best results.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Distearoylethyl Dimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Erythritol, Panthenol, Cetyl Alcohol, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Saccharide Isomerate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Phytate, Maltodextrin, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Sodium Hydroxide, Lepidium Meyenii Root Extract, Nasturtium Officinale Extract, Tropaeolum Majus Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Tocopherol, Sorbic Acid, Alanyl Glutamine, Arginine, Oligopeptide-177, Sodium Chloride, Phenylalanine, Sisymbrium Irio Seed Oil.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Extreme Rich Deep-Conditioning Treatment 150ml
description: An intensified version of an iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsley’s Elasticizer Extreme will transform your hair care ritual, even if you’re struggling with very dry, damaged hair. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects – and this edition contains higher active doses of its clever ingredients to offer even more intense benefits. Originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, the formula boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture in the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny – and all before you’ve used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage – you’ll never want to wash your hair without it.
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer Extreme in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Extreme Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Ethylhexyl Dimethyl PABA, Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-37, Diazolidinyl Urea, Silicone Quaternium-18, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Trideceth-12, Trideceth-6, Cetrimonium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Elastin, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin

name: Aveda Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo 200ml
description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo, your new wash day essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal silky soft strands. Available in a full size 100ml and travel-friendly 50ml, this shampoo is a must-add to your wash day rituals. The skinification of hair is here to stay, and Aveda’s problem-solving Scalp Solutions range has everything you need to restore harmony and reset your scalp. Start your wash day the right way with the Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo, enriched with plant-derived cleansing agents this restorative formula gently cleanses while removing problematic product build-up. Whether your scalp is normal, dry or oily, this cooling shampoo works to boost hydration by up to 92%… salon-worthy shine incoming in three, two, one...
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair and scalp. Rinse well. Follow with scalp solutions replenishing conditioner. Use daily or as often as needed.

name: OUAI Thick Hair Shampoo 300ml
description: Making wash-day dread a thing of the past, the Thick Hair Shampoo is brimming with strand-smoothing ingredients to control and care for thick, unruly heads of hair. The next best thing when you can’t schedule a blowout at your all-time favourite salon, this rich formula is infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin to encourage sleek, frizz-free lengths. A nourishing cocktail of shea butter and avocado oil (your hair will adore the abundance of oleic and linoleic acid!) imparts an impressive wave of hydration to your hair, while marshmallow root smooths each strand for a silk-like effect. The iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is a beautiful bonus; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a gorgeous scent that lingers even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair - pause to admire the gorgeous scent - then rinse thoroughly.

name: Color Wow Root Cover Up 1.9g (Various Shades)
description: Available in eight colour-correcting hues, this weightless mineral powder clings to your hair to cover the look of greys and any dark roots that threaten to peek out to deliver seamless, consolidated colour. Complete with a mirror and double-ended application brush (one side flat for broad sweeps and one small and domed for targeted precision), colour cover-ups have never been so easy. It settles over your strands with a never stiff, sticky or waxy finish, instead, youre bound to forget you even applied it. The no-mess formula is designed to last from one shampoo to the next, withstanding even your most restless nights and high-energy workouts. Just when we thought we couldnt love them anymore, these powders have a water-resistant finish so swimming is never off the cards!
how_to_use: Apply to dry hair. Load up the small end of the brush with powder. Use free hand to pull hair flat/taut against head and press brush down firmly into roots, starting from scalp and working out - do not use sweeping motion. Apply more powder as needed. To extend highlights, use the side edge of the small brush. Lightly dust off any excess powder with wide end of the brush.

name: Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray 238ml
description: Achieve fuller-looking hair with the Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray. Delivering volume, texture and a long-lasting finish, the styling spray helps create salon-worthy results. Dispensing texturising molecules throughout the hair, the spray instantly elevates your locks, adding dimension and voluminous shape. The improved valve enables a controlled distribution and a softer spritz, allowing you to have more precision over the product. Formulated to provide heat protection up to 210°C, the spray is compatible for use with heated styling tools.
how_to_use: For use on dry hair. Shake the bottle well before each spritz and hold 6-10 inches away from the head. Begin spraying from the root, moving through to the ends of the hair and work in with your fingers. To create even more volume, tilt your head sideways or upside down and apply for bigger results.
ingredient: Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol Denat., VP/VA Copolymer, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Water/Eau/Aqua, Cyclodextrin, Zeolite, Fragrance/Parfum, Ethylcellulose, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Linalool, Citronellol, Citral, Limonene.

name: VIRTUE Recovery Shampoo 240ml
description: Ideal for dry and damaged hair types, VIRTUE’s Recovery Shampoo gently cleanses and clarifies while supporting a stronger-looking scalp and strands. Featuring Alpha Keratin 60ku®, the nourishing formula works to provide keratin protein to the tresses, protecting against the look of breakage and split ends. Hydrolyzed quinoa promotes visibly enhanced colour vibrancy, while baobab seed oil offers intense moisture to the lengths. Fortified with antioxidant-rich grapefruit extract, the silky shampoo refreshes the hair and leaves it looking lustrous.
how_to_use: Work a coin-sized amount of the shampoo into a lather between palms. Apply to wet hair, massage into a rich lather, and rinse.

name: VIRTUE One for All 6-in-1 Styler Cream Travel Size 60ml
description: A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. Uniting this advanced protein with a host of other powerful ingredients, this One For All 6-In-One Styler truly does it all, providing softness, shine and light hydration, while also strengthening, polishing and protecting from heat. It’s enriched with panthenol (vitamin B5) a natural B vitamin that delivers moisture, softness and shine, cypress, an antioxidant rich essential oil known for light, soothing hydration and strengthening polymers, which work like an invisible scaffold to provide light hold and block out humidity. Fragranced with a fresh, verdant citrus blend featuring sweet orange, cypress and elemi essential oils, this truly is a gift from the hair care gods. What's more, after one week in a clinical trial, 89% of users found their hair felt softer, while 86% reported their hair looked healthier!
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp or dry hair from mid-shaft to ends.

name: OUAI Thick Hair Conditioner 300ml
description: A ‘get rich quick’ treatment for thick hair demanding the TLC treatment, OUAI Haircare’s Thick Hair Conditioner rescues ‘big’ hair that’s in need of attention. With replenishing marshmallow root and a strengthening cocktail of keratin, shea and avocado butters to boost elasticity and promote manageability, this frizz-fighting, smoothing and gloss-granting formula renders the most strong-willed strands much more biddable – softening coarse, porous lengths to promote definition and grant a sleek, post-salon swish. Deliciously scented like all OUAI creations, this post-cleansing formula stars the brand’s signature ‘Mercer Street’ perfume – a medley of orange, peony, magnolia, jasmine, musk and orris. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.
how_to_use: After shampooing, apply to ends, then comb through with fingers. Leave for around three minutes before rinsing thoroughly.

name: Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 15ml
description: The future of hair repair is here in the form of Living Proof's Triple Bond Complex. Think of this as your healthy hair architect that works within your tresses to fortify every strand and help you achieve all your hair care dreams, and with this sized-to-go 15ml you need never go without! Used weekly, this intensive reparative treatment is clinically proven to reconstruct damaged hair, while protecting it against future damage to keep your mane in optimal condition. Chemical treatments, bleach and heat-induced damage all take their toll, but thankfully, the Triple Bond Complex is on hand to deliver immediate repair and lasting protection so your hair is restored to a healthy state. Harnessing the powers of a breakthrough, patent-pending technology, this hair saviour repairs and replenishes ionic, hydrogen and covalent bonds. After just one use you'll see immediate results (the impatient amongst us can rejoice), as it will look and feel healthier, with significant improvements being made inside your strands too. Not forgetting about the element of protection, encapsulated cellular oil can be found within this little bottle of gold dust to protect your hair from thermal and UV damage. All of this in a once-a-week treatment? Our hair care routine is getting upgraded asap!
how_to_use: Shampoo and Condition hair as usual. Then apply 2 pumps to clean, damp hair. Add more as needed, based on hair length, texture, and level of damage. Comb through. Do not rinse out. For best results, wait 10 minutes before applying other treatments or stylers and blow dry. Product does not require heat, but you will see best results with heat activation. Use weekly.

name: OUAI Wave Spray 145ml
description: From celebrity coiffeuse Jen Atkin – responsible for maintaining the manes of Klan Kardashian, Gigi Hadid and Gwen Stefani (to name a few) – OUAI’s ouai-ve spray grants gorgeous separation and flexible hold while perfuming your hair with its heavenly blend of Italian lemon, rose de mai, magnolia, lily, blackberry, cedarwood, amber, patchouli, sandalwood and white musk. Simply twist still-damp hair and mist lengths with Wave Spray then ‘unravel’ to reveal enviable, ‘French girl’ bed-hair texture.
how_to_use: Shake it up. Mist damp or dry hair from root to tip for easy, undone texture and enhanced natural waves. Or, just hit the roots for extra volume. Jen's Tip: Spritz it on damp or dry hair to activate natural waves, enhance texture, boost body and give hair memory.

name: Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Conditioner 200ml
description: Winner of the 'Ultimate Shampoo and Conditioner' Grazia Award in 2020 and the 'Best Conditioner for Damaged Hair' Marie Claire Hair Award in 2021, Aveda’s Botanical Repair Strengthening Conditioner nourishes and instantly detangles, helping to rebuild brittle strands for a supple, soft and silky result. With 98% nature-derived ingredients, this deep-conditioning hero smooths, strengthens and separates compromised hair – feeding your lengths with a cocktail of healing, replenishing extracts that maximise shine and help minimise breakage. Suitable for all hair types and textures – even colour-treated and chemically processed – this featherweight formula helps to restore heat- or bleach-weakened hair to its natural glory, while its heavenly scent will envelop your headspace with beautiful, mood-boosting fragrance.
how_to_use: Use following Botanical Repair Strengthening Shampoo. Massage into wet hair, rinse well.
