name: BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Shampoo
description: Swear by slate-toned tresses with BLEACH LONDON's Fade To Grey Shampoo. Battling brassiness in pre-lightened hair, this toning shampoo helps to maintain the coolest manes in the capital. Formulated with innovative anti-green stain (if you know you know) technology, this gentle mask-like cleanser refreshes lengths while helping to fade out-of-place warm tones and maintain your style. Shaking up your look and skipping the salon appointment, all without making a colour commitment, this clever formula grants a slate grey sheen that's perfect for topping up the coverage of already toned hair (on light blonde lengths gradual build up is key!). As if all that wasn't enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH's products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool.

Avoid contact with clothing and towels.

name: Aesop Conditioner 500ml
description: The key to coaxing tangles from your tresses, Aesop's lightweight Conditioner nourishes your hair as it replenishes moisture to reveal silky soft lengths. Both beautiful and practical, Aesop's ethos is all about marrying old world wisdom with new tech disciplines - harnessing the finest botanical extracts and fusing them with the latest and greatest scientific discoveries - to bring out the best of your hair. This luscious formula is infused with a blend of nourishing oils to deeply hydrate your strands and cloak them with an earthy yet citrusy scent that lingers even after you rinse the conditioner away. It's also saturated with amino acids to deliver a wave of stand-softening hydration: this way for sleek and silky hair!
how_to_use: After shampooing, squeeze out excess water. Dispense the desired amount of conditioner into your hands. Apply to the mid-lengths and ends of the hair and ensure even distribution. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Drunk Elephant Wild Marula Tangle Spray
description: A superfine, weightless leave-in mist, this Wild Marula Tangle Spray effectively detangles and smooths while restoring natural movement, manageability and shine without weighing hair down. Introducing Drunk Elephant's all-new and utterly must-have hair and body range, created by the brand's CEO, Tiffany because "Skin is skin - and whether we call it the scalp or the eye area or the legs, it can only function at its healthiest when it’s treated with smart, nourishing, skin-compatible ingredients. All skin deserves to be respected with ingredients it can get along with." Created in collaboration with professional hair stylist - and creator of 'The Rachel' haircut - Chris McMillan, together they created a line of hair care that focuses on the scalp - products that dissolve years of buildup while nourishing hair with biocompatible proteins and oils. The rest just grew from there. Formulated with plant oils and advanced, silicone-free smoothing and anti-static agents to provide heat protection, this superfine, weightless leave-in mist from Drunk Elephant unites a host of strengthening, conditioning and protecting good-to-hair ingredients that will leave hair with noticeably more body, bounce and manageability that's protected while heat styling too!
how_to_use: Spray evenly over towel-dried or damp hair and comb through. No need to rinse. Shake before use.

name: Philip Kingsley Body Building Conditioner 200ml
description: To give your hair maximum volume while gently hydrating, Philip Kingsley's Body Building Conditioner boosts fine, limp hair with weightless body and bounce. Ideal for flat hair that's prone to getting oily quickly, the formula plumps each and every strand for a thicker, fuller effect. It's enriched with wheat protein to both achieve this plumping and strengthen, as well as silicone to add shine and reduce static, all without adding any unwanted weight. Meanwhile, behentrimonium chloride smooths the cuticle and quickly detangles. Suitable for daily use and safe for colour-treated hair, Body Building Conditioner makes fine hair healthier and more manageable. And now this 'oomph'-boosting formula comes in a handy travel size (75ml) too because nobody fancies flat hair on their holidays.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently work into mid-lengths and ends Rinse well Follow with appropriate Philip Kingsley scalp toner

description: As well as gently cleansing your hair, BLEACH London’s Rosé Shampoo imparts a subtle touch of stunning pink colour. It can be used to neutralise unwanted green tones in your hair, or to enhance blonde shades with a soft, pastel pink rinse. Ideal followed with BLEACH’s {Rosé Conditioner}, this is the perfect way to change up your style without making a big colour commitment. What’s more, like the entire BLEACH line, the luscious formula is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason to love it.

name: Fable & Mane SahaScalp Wild Ginger Purifying Scrub
description: Great hair health begins with the scalp! Enter: Fable & Mane’s crowning glory, the SahaScalp Wild Ginger Purifying Scrub. Whipped up with ginger, neem leaf and amla (also known as Indian gooseberry), the SahaScalp Wild Ginger Purifying Scrub feeds your precious scalp with vitamin C while lending its antiseptic, antifungal and purifying properties to soothe, relieve flakiness and strengthen. Also calling on pink Himalayan salt to stimulate hair follicles and whisk away product build-up, this luxurious scrub prevents flakiness and comes in a deliciously airy texture for a gentle, nurturing lather that feels utterly divine.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Instant De-Frizzer 95ml
description: Frizz-smoothing is a notoriously tricky business – most anti-frizz products rely on silicones to lubricate the hair’s surface and weigh strands down, which helps to minimise friction but ceases to be as effective when things get hot and humid. Frizz is the product of these two factors; when hair is exposed to humidity or dampness, the moisture is absorbed into the hair fibre, causing the cuticle to flare out – as the strands rub against one another, the increase in friction results in frizz, so a true solution must successfully tackle both of these issues. Living Proof took it upon themselves to devise the biggest and most innovative anti-frizz breakthrough; OFPMA – the proprietary technology in Living Proof’s No Frizz products – which coats each strand more evenly than silicones, so moisture is unable to penetrate the hair shaft. It also helps to smooth each strand’s texture, so friction is minimised and frizz is conquered. Also in the Instant De-Frizzer is a clever blend of oils which replicate the functions of those found naturally in the hair, plus conditioning agents to soften and seal the cuticle. The result? Sleek, smooth and frizz-free locks.
how_to_use: For medium to thick hair, hold canister 6-10" away and spray on dry hair in a sweeping motion. Smooth hair with hands or comb. For fine hair, focus on applying from mid-lengths to ends. To spot treat, spray in hand and apply to specific sections.

This velveteen conditioner boosts the body of your hair as it softens and smooths each strand, so you can spend less time scrunching or teasing and more time chilling. It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin and biotin to promote thick, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of hemp seed extract and chia seed oil grants lasting, weightless(!) hydration to your fine hair. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is the perfect finishing touch; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a beautiful scent even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.

name: BLEACH LONDON The Big Pink Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: OUAI Medium Hair Shampoo Refill 946ml

It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin to encourage smooth, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of babassu and coconut oil grants deeply nourishing hydration to your hair. name: OUAI Super Dry Shampoo 127g
description: From celebrity coiffeuse Jen Atkin – responsible for maintaining the manes of Klan Kardashian, Gigi Hadid and Gwen Stefani (to name a few) – OUAI’s Super Dry Shampoo helps to clean and volume while lightly fragrancing your mane. Phenomenally oil-absorbent but non-powdery, this is so featherweight that it’s completely invisible – refreshing hair in-between washes and adding root ‘oomph’ to hair that’s falling flat. It’s a definite must-have addition to your hair care arsenal (and it looks très chic in your bathroom cabinet/desk drawer/handbag…). Available in a sized-to-try bottle (56g) as well as the original (127g), now's the time to discover this wash day-delaying hero.

name: Olaplex Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit
description: Calling all blondes! Say goodbye to dull, brassy, brittle hair with the Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit, a four-step ritual designed to restore visible strength and vibrancy to blonde, lightened and grey hair. Working as a two-part system, the No.0 Hair Treatment and No.3 Hair Perfector™ draw upon the brand’s patented bond-building technology to repair visible damage and brittleness. Next up is No.4P Blonde Enhancer™ Toning Shampoo, a purple shampoo formulated to banish brassiness and brighten your blonde; all while cleansing hair of impurities. Completing your vibrancy-boosting routine, No.8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask restores weightless moisture (goodbye dry, dehydrated hair), adds shine and enhances smoothness.
how_to_use: No.0 (40ml): Before you wash your hair, apply No.0 slowly to dry hair, distributing evenly from root to tip and working into small sections by squeezing the liquid into the hair to be fully absorbed as you go. Hair should be damp, not drenched. Let process for 10 minutes then follow with No.3. Do not rinse at any point. No.3 (30ml): Use directly after No.0. Apply generously to damp hair from scalp to ends until hair is thoroughly saturated. Leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes (or longer if desired). Then, rinse well. No.4P (20ml): Apply to wet hair. Lather fully and leave on for 1-3 minutes. Rinse well. For more intense toning, leave on hair up to 5 minutes. No.8 (20ml): Apply mask to clean, damp hair mid-length to ends and work through with fingers. Leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse well and style as usual. Start with 2 pumps for shoulder-length hair. Use more for longer, thicker hair, and less for fine or short hair.

name: The Ordinary Behentrimonium Chloride 2% Conditioner 240ml
description: With a minimalistic-yet-effective formula, the Behentrimonium Chloride 2% Conditioner will help to condition, soften and detangle hair without unnecessary, filler ingredients. The star ingredient here — as the name may suggest — is behentrimonium chloride. Though you might not have heard about this ingredient much, it’s likely on the INCI list of some of your favourite conditioners, and The Ordinary have tailored this lightweight formula to hero it at a 2% concentration (a low potency that still allows for the full efficacy of the ingredient). This helps to condition your mane (yes, even if its colour treated!) while adding plenty of slip and helping to detangle strands. In turn, this makes brushing or combing through your hair a whole lot easier, leading to less damage and stress in the long run.
how_to_use: Work the conditioner into wet hair. Rinse. If irritation occurs, rinse off, cease use, and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Color Wow Extra Mist-ical Shine Spray 162ml
description: A ring light for your hairstyle, Color Wow's Extra Shine Spray is an über-lightweight finishing mist that lends hair an intensely glossy shine for your healthiest hair yet. Non-greasy, non-drying and non-sticky, this mane-changing Extra Shine Spray from Color Wow harnesses the light-refracting power of mullein (a flower phenom that captures invisible UV light and converts it into full-spectrum light - which results in a brilliant show of radiance). Completely weightless so you don't have to worry about styles collapsing or feeling heavy, this spray will quickly become a firm favourite for special events or when you want to revive lost lustre an the press of a button.
how_to_use: Use it on every style, any way you choose:

name: Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Shampoo 200ml
description: When it comes to damaged tresses, it's more important than ever to choose a shampoo that replenishes your hair rather than stripping it; that's where Aveda's Botanical Repair Strengthening Shampoo comes in! Winner of the 'Ultimate Shampoo and Conditioner 2020' Grazia Award, this luxurious cleanser helps to shift excess sebum, product build-up and pollution residue, all while working to strengthen and repair your strands. Designed to counter the daily stresses our hair experiences and restore depleted lengths to their former glory, this 94% naturally derived formula is powered by a medley of plant extracts and oils that encourage the repair of your hair from the inside out, building bonds for stronger hair that's more resistant to damage. This nourishing shampoo is formulated with all hair types and textures in mind and is even safe for colour-treated and chemically processed hair - we think it's time you introduced it to your routine, don't you?

Leading the way in scalp-friendly formulas, Grow Gorgeous has powered up their original serum to create an ultra-concentrated invigorating treatment to revive even the limpest of hair. Adding onto the original formula of energising Chinese scullcap, organic pea sprout and caffeine, this intensified treatment offers even more rejuvenating results with a blend of red clover and a biomimetic peptide. Your roots won't know what hit them when this amped-up formula gets to work, and with the thicker, healthier hair on the horizon, who are we to say no?

name: OUAI Super Dry Shampoo Travel Size 56g
description: From celebrity coiffeuse Jen Atkin – responsible for maintaining the manes of Klan Kardashian, Gigi Hadid and Gwen Stefani (to name a few) – OUAI’s Super Dry Shampoo helps to clean and volume while lightly fragrancing your mane. Phenomenally oil-absorbent but non-powdery, this is so featherweight that it’s completely invisible – refreshing hair in-between washes and adding root ‘oomph’ to hair that’s falling flat. It’s a definite must-have addition to your hair care arsenal (and it looks très chic in your bathroom cabinet/desk drawer/handbag…). Available in a sized-to-try bottle (56g) as well as the original (127g), now's the time to discover this wash day-delaying hero.

description: Water-based and fragrance-free, this clear formula provides immediate and long-lasting relief from flaking and itchy scalps. The innovative ‘wash and wear’ formula enhances and encourages your hair’s natural wave patterns for more consistency, softer strands, minimised frizz and boosted definition. Perfect for those with wavy or curly hair, you simply massage the foam into damp hair, scrunch and go – waves will dry into the perfect ‘beachy’ shape without frizz or crunch. Kale protein, carrot protein and panthenol nourish and strengthen hair, adding touchable texture and keeping your mane happy as well as magnificent. The lazy option never looked so good…

description: Here to protect against three major signs of lacklustre lengths – loss of shine, strength and volume – Coco & Eve’s innovative Youth Revive Pro Youth Hair & Scalp Mask gives your locks a new lease of luscious life. The five-minute mask also helps to balance excess sebum and oils – meaning fewer hair-wash days on the horizon (hurrah!). Suitable for all hair types and textures, the once-weekly formula provides your locks with a much-needed surge of moisture, resulting in less breakage and visible split ends; all while inducing a silk-like softness and shine.

description: On the hunt for a hair oil that not only gives your mane a mirror-like shine, but also cloaks it in nourishing ingredients strands are guaranteed to lap up? Look no further than Augustinus Bader’s The Hair Oil with TCF8. Ultra-hydrating and yet impressively lightweight, this restorative elixir repairs dryness and split ends while actively reducing further breakage by deeply conditioning locks and protecting them against damage. It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin to encourage smooth, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of babassu and coconut oil grants virtually endless hydration to your hair. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is another beautiful bonus; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a gorgeous scent that lingers even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.

name: Fable & Mane Sahascalp Amla Soothing Serum
description: As Hindu mythology would have it, the amla tree grew from where Brahma’s tears hit the earth during meditation. Said to have been the first ever tree to germinate, its berries are rich in vitamin C and a popular Ayurvedic remedy for keeping scalps in tip-top condition. Delightfully weightless, the SahaScalp Amla Soothing Serum harnesses the power of amla to deeply condition hair and soothe itchy scalps. Bakuchi (extracted from babchi plant seeds) balances the crown chakra and helps to rejuvenate sensitive skin while hydrating and encouraging skin cell regeneration. Aloe then strengthens and nourishes dry scalps, and vitamin E cools itchiness. A root-to-tip nourishing elixir, this serum nourishes hair, clears product build-up from the scalp, softens hair, smooths cuticles, adds shine and protects hair from further breakage — all with a deliciously mindful scent that instils a sense of peace and calm. Think: a chakra-balancing blend of ripe blackcurrant with tea rose and fresh orange blossom on a bed of woody amber and musk.
how_to_use: Part dry hair. Apply a few drops for fine hair, one full dropper for thick hair. Rub between your palms. Massage into scalp with a focus on your crown to release stress. Focus on dry areas of the scalp. Follow this ritual bi-weekly; for best results leave in overnight. For a deeper treatment, massage a generous amount onto scalp, rinse then cleanse. Safe for all scalp types and suitable for colour-treated hair. Formulated without silicones, parabens, phthalates, sulphates, animal derived ingredients. Cruelty-free and vegan.

name: Color Wow Dream Coat Anti-Frizz Treatment Supersize 500ml
description: Obsessed with Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray? Well you can now stock up on this Holy grail hero to last even longer thansk to the Supersize which helps seals each strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak - perfect for fighting frizz. If you colour your hair, your strands are probably more porous and vulnerable to humidity - which means more risk of frizz! Introducing Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray, which 'shrinkwraps' every strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak to prevent frizz and flyaways. Heat-activated, the effects of this spray last through three to four washes and work to compress, tighten and seal hair strands for a supernaturally sleek, smooth and ultra-silky finish. Unlike typical 'humidity-guard' serums, Dream Coat will not build up, weigh hair down or make it greasy - and it comes in a handbag-compatible size so you never fall foul of the weather.

This Be Curly Curl Enhancer from Aveda does just that while helping to reduce frizz and increase shine too - that's what we're talking about! Formulated with wheat protein which expands when hair is wet, then retracts when hair is dry to help lock in curls or waves, this Be Curly Curl Enhancer will effortlessly help to define and intensify your curls. Where tousled tresses meet the crashing waves on the shore for a fun and flirty ‘do that needs a little zsushing up, the Superfoods Banana + Coconut Soft Wave Texture Spray Travel Size delivers vitamin-rich nourishment to your locks on-the-go… Leaving the saltiness for the ocean water, this wave-enhancing formula is bursting with hair-strengthening vitamin B5 that supports your strands, fruit-derived antioxidants, potassium-packed banana extract that deeply nourishes parched hair and hydrating coconut sugar which encourages piecy separation for the most effortless looking beach waves. name: Pattern Hydrating Mist 88.7ml
description: Brimming with luxe, hydrating ingredients, this fine mist reactivates curls and keeps wash day at bay without compromising on style. As with all PATTERN hair care, the Hydrating Mist is free of SLS/SLES, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. Instead, it infuses a blend of aloe vera, coconut oil, avocado oil and shea butter to flood thirsty locks with moisture and add an abundance of nourishment in-between washes. Not to mention, this milky formula even protects against environmental aggressors that threaten to damage your curls and coils. If your curls are looking limp and lifeless, expect this mist to refresh and reactivate them back to life, so they're ready for whatever style you choose to don.
how_to_use: Give the bottle a good shake to help prime the mist pump to suck up the milky goodness and be ready to spray. May take a little bit to get the juicy flow going! Spritz on to rehydrate wash-&-gos or use to refresh your hairstyle.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Caryodendron Orinocense Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Liquid Endosperm, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyurethane-14, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyisobutene, Dicetyl Phosphate, Ceteth-10 Phosphate, AMP-Acrylates Copolymer, Potassium Stearate, Stearic acid, Propanediol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Cetrimonium Chloride, Sorbitan Oleate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Phospholipids, Polyglyceryl-10 Dioleate, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum).

name: Philip Kingsley One More Day Refreshing Dry Shampoo 200ml
description: Too busy (or lazy…) to wash your hair? Fear not – Philip Kingsley’s fabulous formula will keep your mane magnificent for another day. Helping to maintain the wellbeing of your hair and scalp between washes, this award-winning formula swiftly refreshes stressed-out tresses by eradicating excess dirt, oil and odour, absorbing excess sebum and keeping flakes and irritation at bay. The ingenious ingredients are scalp-friendly (nothing less than we’d expect from tricotherapist and renowned ‘Hair Doctor’ Philip Kingsley) including zinc PCA to regulate sebum production, bisabolol to relieve flaking and irritation, rice starch to thicken and texturise hair in one spritz and, last but certainly not least, allantoin to soothe and calm the scalp. Imparting enviable volume and texture as it refreshes, One More Day Dry Shampoo will leave you more than ready to face another day.
how_to_use: Shake vigorously before use Keep nozzle about 30cms from the hair and spray onto roots Leave for 10 seconds and massage into scalp and hair Brush and follow with the Philip Kingsley styling products as required
ingredient: Butane, Propane, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Alcohol Denat., Isobutane, Zinc PCA, Allantoin, Bisabolol, Parfum (Fragrance), Cetrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Limonene, Linalool

name: Malin + Goetz Peppermint Shampoo 236ml
description: If you’re morning shower is as much a wake-up call as it is a scrub-a-dub-dub, MALIN + GOETZ’ Peppermint Shampoo is definitely for you. With a reviving peppermint scent, it’s blended with natural peppermint extract to give your hair (and your energy levels) and fresh zing without being overpowering. The gentle formula is cleverly infused with amino acid-based cleansing agents which remove dirt, excess oil and product build-up without stripping or drying the hair or scalp. Instead, it leaves your locks soft and sleek – what’s not to love?
how_to_use: Massage a small amount onto wet hair and scalp to create a gentle lather. Rinse clean.
ingredient: Aqua|Water|Eau, Ammonium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycerin, Cocamide Mipa, Fragrance (Parfum), Panthenol, Polyquaternium-7, Polyquaternium-10, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium Edta, Sodium Citrate, Methoxy Peg/Ppg-7/3 Aminopropyl Dimethicone, Alanine, Arginine, Betaine, Glutamic Acid, Glycine, Lysine, Proline, Serine, Sodium Pca, Sorbitol, Threonine, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Geraniol

name: Living Proof No Frizz Conditioner 236ml
description: The ultimate mane-taming follow up to No Frizz Shampoo, Living Proof’s No Frizz Conditioner has a weightless, detangling formula to minimise hair stress when styling, whilst nourishing strands to preserve precious pigment and leave your locks feeling super-soft, shiny and ‘slippery’. Powered by the brand’s patented ‘Healthy Hair Molecule’ (OFPMA), which helps block humidity 70% more effectively than traditional oils and silicones whilst repelling environmental grime and pollutants – this heavenly hair-hydrator is a must-have in the war against frizz – rendering tresses more meek, mild and manageable. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.
how_to_use: Start with No Frizz Shampoo. Apply No Frizz Conditioner to clean, wet hair, focusing on midshaft to ends. Spread evenly throughout hair. Rinse. Follow with one of Living Proof's No Frizz styling products.
ingredient: Water/Eau/Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Octafluoropentyl Methacrylate(OFPMA), Behentrimonium Chloride, Quaternium-87, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Fragrance/Parfum, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citronellol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Magnesium Nitrate, Magnesium Chloride.

name: VIRTUE Healing Oil 50ml
description: Available in 20ml and 50ml sizes, the Healing Oil infuses dry and damaged lengths with an impressive dose of shine-giving moisture, calling upon a nourishing blend of proteins and oils to protect and restore your hair. Formulated with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole- human keratin born from regenerative medicine - this restorative formula binds directly to areas of damage and fills them. What’s more, there’s a nourishing blend of Tahitian tiare flower (to help remedy weak and damaged strands) and antioxidant-rich Kalahari melon seed oil to protect against environmental aggressors while imparting lasting hydration. Made from clear oils, this innovative formula grants a glossy finish that won’t mar your colour of weigh down your lengths. The luscious oil has a delicious tropical scent with notes of creamy coconut, yuzu extract and woody undertones that linger subtly on your tresses after use. The results? Seriously soft, healthy-looking hair with an unrivalled shine.
how_to_use: Shake well before each use to mix key ingredients and activate the formula. Pump a few drops into hands and work throughout damp and/or dry hair. Style as desired.
ingredient: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethiconol, Parfum (Fragrance), Alpha Keratin, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Gardenia Taitensis Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Hexyl Laurate, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Silicone Quaternium-3, Trideceth-12, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Limonene, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate.

name: Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Shampoo 75ml
description: Cleansing and clarifying, this anti-dandruff shampoo has been specially formulated to remove the irritation and potential embarrassment that dry, flaky scalps too often bring. Developed by ‘The Hair Doctor’, Philip Kingsley, whose work centred around scalp (as well as hair) heath, this formula was originally created for Sir Laurence Olivier. Unlike other dandruff treatments, Flaky Itchy Scalp Shampoo does not dry out the hair or strip it of colour, gently cleansing with specialised ingredients instead and removing build up and irritation, so effectively that 99% of those tested in a consumer trial said that it cleared their flaky scalp. With a delicate apple fragrance, this can be used every day as your main shampoo, or in conjunction with the shampoo recommended for your hair texture. Available in travel and full sizes, you need never be without your favourite hair saviour...
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair Lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp Rinse and repeat if necessary Follow with the appropriate Philip Kingsley conditioner and scalp toner Use daily to cleanse your scalp and thereafter at regular intervals as required
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, TEA-Lauryl Sulfate, Lauryl Betaine, PEG-4 Rapeseedamide, Piroctone Olamine, Citric Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Chloride.

name: Color Wow Colour Security Conditioner for Fine to Normal Hair 250ml
description: Replenishing moisture-deprived hair without weighing it down with shine-dulling residue, this smoothing conditioner hydrates as it coaxes tangles out of colour-treated tresses. Available in two variations – the non-flattening, lightweight ‘Fine-to-Normal’ and the smoothing, cuticle-sealing ‘Normal-to-Thick’ – this softening formula is made without darkening agents and certain conditioning agents (particles that oxidise on your hair, corrupting your carefully chosen colour with a brassy finish). Instead, it’s powered by their colour-shielding Sealicon complex that delivers a protective, glossy finish, plus eight translucent conditioning agents to make compromised strands a whole lot more manageable.
how_to_use: After shampooing with Color Security Shampoo, apply a small amount to wet hair, starting about 2 inches from scalp, and distribute evenly along hair strand to ends. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Behentrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Fragrance/Parfum, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Isopropyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Polyquaternium-7, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Propylene Glycol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ceteareth-20, Citric Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Sorbitan Oleate, Hydrolyzed Rice protein, Disodium EDTA, Trideceth-12, Dimethiconol, Sodium Benzoate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Potassium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool.

name: Pacifica Pineapple Swirl Curl Defining Cream 118ml
description: Your curls, defined — that’s the end goal of Pacifica’s Pineapple Swirl Curl Defining Cream. Designed to reduce frizz and add shine, this hydrating cream will make styling your tendrils all the more efficient. Like all of Pacifica’s formulas, this styling essential is made in the USA from the best globally sourced ingredients; this particular blend is infused with coconut oil, pineapple extract and hyaluronic acid to add manageability and soft bounce, enhancing your shine and definition in the process. Formulated without silicone, parabens or phthalates or petroleum, this styling cream is sure to become a curl-care staple.
how_to_use: Before styling apply to clean, wet hair focusing on ends. Air dry or diffuse. Can also be used on dry hair to add texture or calm frizzy ends.
ingredient: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Coco-caprylate, Cetyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum (Natural), Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid.

name: Pattern Leave-in Conditioner 88.7ml
description: Say goodbye to your gorgeous frizz halo with the Leave-In Conditioner that adds floods of moisture with that little bit of oomph needed to nourish curls after your wash routine but before styling. As with all PATTERN hair care, the Leave-In Conditioner is free of sls/sles, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. But what it has got is a natural blend of oils - we're talking coconut, sweet almond, tea tree, avocado - and honey to deliver moisture and lock it in at the same time. Not only does this nourishing formula make it easier to detangle your mane but its lightweight texture adds soft definition with a light hold. Leaving a light floral scent comprised of neroli, rose and patchouli, make dry, frizzy hair a thing of the past and prepare to see your best curls and coils yet.
how_to_use: Apply to soaking wet, conditioned curly hair evenly distributing to all strands. Pro tip: Cocktail in a few drops of PATTERN Argan Oil Hair Serum with Leave-In Conditioner for an extra moisture boost on wet hair. Also works well on dry hair & frizzy hair to tame flyaways & offer a light hold.
ingredient: Aqua (Water, Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Biotin, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Mel (Honey, Miel), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Trideceth-3, Trideceth-15, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Parfum (Fragrance), PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Glycerin, Aminomethyl Propanol, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Alcohol, Acetic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium EDTA, Linalool, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Coumarin, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal.

name: Davines LOVE Curl Hair Mask 250ml
description: Tailored towards hair that’s curly or wavy, LOVE Curl Mask imparts intensive, much-needed moisture and elasticity without weighing strands down. The lusciously creamy formula is enriched with Noto almond extract, harvested from the farm of Mr. Carlo Assenza in Noto, Syracuse. These heirloom nuts are brimming with hair-strengthening proteins and moisturising healthy fats, which are capable of hydrating textured hair without disrupting its delicate balance, so that hair is neither stripped nor overburdened. Alongside this, Davines’ high performing blend of conditioning agents detangles effortlessly and swiftly restores tresses in distress. Scented with a refreshing yet indulgent note of green citrus, this is the perfect choice for all you curly-haired Cult Beauties.
how_to_use: Apply to damp hair after {LOVE Curl Shampoo}. Leave in for 10-15 minutes, comb through and rinse. Proceed with drying.
ingredient: Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Quaternium-87, Panthenol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Fragrance, Isopropyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Lauryl Alcohol, Glyceryl Olivate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Seed Extract, Disodium Edta, Sodium Benzoate, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Alcohol, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Limonene

name: Living Proof Full Shampoo 236ml
description: When hair falls flat, you feel flat – which is why the brains and beauty experts behind Living Proof’s Full Shampoo, strove tirelessly to develop new and innovative technology, to create body and volume that lasts! Powdered by the brand's patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), this must-have body-builder helps cleanse delicate hair types, whilst repelling dirt and oil to ensure your hair is not weighed down, promoting natural-looking fullness without any stiffness or restrictive weight. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies – and without parabens, sulphates or silicones – Living Proof abandoned the usual shampoo ‘recipe’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.
how_to_use: Apply Full Shampoo to wet hair. Massage into a rich lather, focusing on the roots. Rinse. Follow with Full Conditioner. Note: This shampoo is suitable for coloured hair.
ingredient: Water/Eau/Aqua, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate (Cleansing Agent), Decyl Glucoside, Lactamide MEA, Octafluoropentyl Methacrylate (OFPMA), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, PEG-150 Pentaerithrityl Tetrastearate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Polyquaternium-47, PEG-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Propanediol, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Tetrasodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Methylisothiazolinone, Fragrance/Parfum, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citronellol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Magnesium Chloride, Magnesium Nitrate.
